description:
container/heap: revise example and add a simpler example.

      This adds a simple IntHeap example, and modifies the more complex
PriorityQueue example to make use of the index field it maintains.

Fixes issue 4331.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: rsc@golang.org),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

Looks good, thanks.

https://codereview.appspot.com/7068048/diff/4001/src/pkg/container/heap/example_pq_test.go
File src/pkg/container/heap/example_pq_test.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7068048/diff/4001/src/pkg/container/heap/example_pq_test.go#newcode33
src/pkg/container/heap/example_pq_test.go:33: pq[i].index, pq[j].index = i, j
Please restore the old code. This is not a swap.

PTAL.

https://codereview.appspot.com/7068048/diff/4001/src/pkg/container/heap/example_pq_test.go
File src/pkg/container/heap/example_pq_test.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7068048/diff/4001/src/pkg/container/heap/example_pq_test.go#newcode33
src/pkg/container/heap/example_pq_test.go:33: pq[i].index, pq[j].index = i, j
On 2013/01/18 20:08:24, rsc wrote:
> Please restore the old code. This is not a swap.

Done.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=2ea8f07b2ffe ***

container/heap: split example into two

This adds a simple IntHeap example, and modifies the more complex
PriorityQueue example to make use of the index field it maintains.

Fixes issue 4331.

R=rsc, adg
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7068048

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>
